scripts.sync: npm run build && cp dist/index.html www/ && npx cap sync
scripts.ios: npm run sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cp dist/index.html www/ && firebase deploy --only hosting && git add www/index.html && git commit -m 'Update www for GitHub Pages' && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:all: npm run build && cp dist/index.html www/ && firebase deploy && git add www/index.html && git commit -m 'Update www for GitHub Pages' && git push origin main
